docs.snippet: Thousands of Yemenis watched as the condemned man, lying face down with hands tied behind him, was shot with an automatic weapon at point-blank range.

docs.snippet: Nine new works show that children’s authors are writing about a difficult subject in a way that is educational, yet mindful of a young audience.
